ai-patthana23.15:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.15:0.3_0: socializing the leading to the object.
ai-patthana23.15:1.1_0: or an unwholesome quality doesn’t give rise to the path,
ai-patthana23.15:2.1_0: Not by reason, not skilled in the teaching, and the path to cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.15:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.15:3.1_0: He doesn’t have the following along the skillful does not arise, nor is a condition for the skillful.
